Translations.Text: Je ona aware z the Overwhelming
Faces ze dni shamed
Robota a exhausted
Suffering blazing Hellfire
pne z flaming jaro
They nie have food zbytocny variety
It never nourishes nor satisfies hunger
Inak faces dni will bol full z radost
Satisfied ich robota
Do exalted Raj
Do it ziaden nonsense heard
Do it jaro flows
Do it there bol luxurious zariadenie
Pne robit available
pitchers v rad
A carpets throughout
Why they nie zrkadlit camels a ako they created
A sky a ako it chov
A mountains a ako they zostrojit
A zem a ako it built
Ona remind tvoj mission je deliver this reminder
Ona have power them
Mat rad for those turn disbelieve
GOD will commit them VELKA retribution
Do us bol ich ultimate destiny
Potom my vola sa them zisk
